chemaxon.checkers

Class MetalloceneErrorChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • chemaxon.checkers.AbstractStructureChecker
      • chemaxon.checkers.MetalloceneErrorChecker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StructureChecker, chemaxon.license.Licensable, PropertyChangeListener, Cloneable, EventListener

    public class MetalloceneErrorChecker
extends AbstractStructureChecker
    MetalloceneErrorChecker detects metallocenes represented in ionic or covalently bonded formats, that are not coordinate multicenters.
    Since:
    Marvin 5.4
    Version:
    5.7
    Author:
    Attila Szabo
